# 牛客网名企春招实习备战攻略 产品运营篇 2019

## 下载

### Docker

```
docker pull apachecn0/niuke-wang-mingqi-chunzhao-shixi-beizhan-gonglve-chanpin-yunying-pian-2019
docker run -tid -p <port>:80 apachecn0/niuke-wang-mingqi-chunzhao-shixi-beizhan-gonglve-chanpin-yunying-pian-2019
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### PYPI

```
pip install niuke-wang-mingqi-chunzhao-shixi-beizhan-gonglve-chanpin-yunying-pian-2019
niuke-wang-mingqi-chunzhao-shixi-beizhan-gonglve-chanpin-yunying-pian-2019 <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### NPM

```
npm install -g niuke-wang-mingqi-chunzhao-shixi-beizhan-gonglve-chanpin-yunying-pian-erlingyijiu
niuke-wang-mingqi-chunzhao-shixi-beizhan-gonglve-chanpin-yunying-pian-erlingyijiu <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```
